name: Single filer at low income
description: Low earner at €30,000 in Spain - below Social Security max base

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 Spanish national IRPF rates and Social Security contributions
sources.notes: IRPF: 19%/24%/30% brackets. Personal allowance €5,550. SS: 6.50% (comunes 4.70% + desempleo 1.55% + FP 0.10% + MEI 0.15%). Max SS base: €61,214.40.
